title: Cheema02
author: Cheema02
content: Hi, I start learning cryptocurrency nowadays everywhere in the field of life like the technology boom has come and also in crypto filed but everyone asks in tiktok join group in some fees for signals. I want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? what is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Those active groups and channels on social media are mostly paid services, where they offer you a few free predictions that might not all be correct and want you to pay for their service in order to add you to their main prediction group, where you can get real signals, which are not 100% guarantees that the trade must always be in your favor.Sorry to say, there is actually no way that I have known of earning from crypto without any form of investment. Investment might not just be your physical cash on funds; you just need to invest something, either your time, attention, or money, and sometimes both. You can actually give a try to the bounty section, where you can see a few bounties that you can participate in, but the payment is not highly guaranteed, even if they end up paying a lot of them, sometimes they always end up completely worthless.Another form of earning from or with crypto is to advertise your skills and services, which you can offer to both the community and outside community members. You will be paid for any form of service rendered based on your specialization, which might be design, development, etc.Another way you can also earn is from the signature campaign aspect, which is not possible for you right now based on your rank. You will need to be at least a member rank before you can see the signature, which might have an open slot for you to apply for and start rendering your posting service.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMI want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? I am not sure what you mean by "without any investment" if you want to earn in the crypto space you must have your Capital ready and you must also be equipped with enough know to help you scale through the space and by knowledge I don't just mean anyhow knowledge what I mean is the right knowledge because in the crypto space we have a lot of misconceptions and if you follow them you might end up losing your funds.Quotewhat is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.I rarely use YouTube for learning bit if you want to learn about Bitcoin and crypto them you should consider checking out the following links: Mastering Bitcoin (GitHub)The Internet of MoneyMastering the Lightning NetworkMastering EthereumBeginners & Help EncyclopediaI just went through your post history and I see that you've been in the bounty section of the forum and if you keep posting there you would end up without any knowledge and your account rank won't change and you won't be able to enroll in any signature campaign if perhaps that's what you mean by "without investment". So just try to go through those links provided above.

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMHi, I start learning cryptocurrency nowadays everywhere in the field of life like the technology boom has come and also in crypto filed but everyone asks in tiktok join group in some fees for signals. I want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? what is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.There are many ways to earn in crypto and the easiest of all is when you have a service that you render on the crypto space, It will be much easier to earn without investing. To learn how to go about this Youtube can be a good start. Then equip yourself with in demand skills that can be rendered on the forum and beyond that way it will be much easier to earn even without investing.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMHi, I start learning cryptocurrency nowadays everywhere in the field of life like the technology boom has come and also in crypto filed but everyone asks in tiktok join group in some fees for signals. I want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? what is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.Its quite a shame to join some group signal now especiallt foe newbie. People are gonna milk money out of your pocket just to gain something in return that has not been guaranteed. Most of them are just giving you off some lousy chart and copy cat gain photos which arent from them. As a newbie you should be focusing more on learning here in forum and avoid such shortcut to earn bitcoin easily. There is no way to earn that fast aside from learning to understanding it first.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMI want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? First know this that bitcointalk is not an investment platform, it's a "bitcoin discussion platform" where people from across the world meet to discuss about bitcoin, but i this process, there are organizations that takes advantage of these to advertise their platforms, organizations, casinos or brands onbthis forum, you can get such obthe service board and you read their requirements if found eligible, but before then, you have to be an active member of this forum contributing well to the growth of the community, if you're lucky to meet the required standard for the signature campaign, they will hire you and you get paid, there are other services you could still enjoy offers from on that same service board.Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMwhat is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.YouTube is not the only place to learn, your first learning ground should be this forum, there are many boards where discussions are ongoing and you could always read to understand and research further on the internet, you will also need to learn about the forum on Meta board and beginners and help

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: If you are familiar with using search engines, you are sure to find trading lessons that work for you. We could have given you all the trading lessons we know, but you will be confused about which one you should learn first.We recommend that you look for it yourself through a search engine or if you are already in this forum, you can start reading around in the Trading section to find the lesson you want. And you have to remember, don't use too much capital if you are still in the learning stage because it is risky.You should use small money first while still learning until you understand. And don't use a trading signal subscription service because you must pay a subscription fee before getting the signal. Also, if you don't know how to trade, you will find it difficult to use the signals.

comments.author: Cheema02
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on May 19, 2023, 12:15:24 PMI rarely use YouTube for learning bit if you want to learn about Bitcoin and crypto then you should consider checking out the following links: Mastering Bitcoin (GitHub)The Internet of MoneyMastering the Lightning NetworkMastering EthereumBeginners & Help EncyclopediaI just went through your post history and I see that you've been in the bounty section of the forum and if you keep posting there you would end up without any knowledge and your account rank won't change and you won't be able to enrol in any signature campaign if perhaps that's what you mean by "without investment". So just try to go through those links provided above.Thanks so much for sharing these Links. I will follow these links and gain my knowledge. Can you suggest to me the best Video content on YouTube Channel So I easily understand and get some knowledge and share it also on bitcoin talk to help Others and also mine to start trading in cryptocurrencies? My second question is how to start earn from this platforms except than bounties because mostly doing scams.

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMHi, I start learning cryptocurrency nowadays everywhere in the field of life like the technology boom has come and also in crypto filed but everyone asks in tiktok join group in some fees for signals. I want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? what is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.Participate in Bitcointalk Contests And Giveaways, here you can win some bitcoins.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5448924.0In a few months you will be able to apply to the Bitcointalk Signature-Ad Campaigns if you earn merithttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=615953.msg62240816#msg62240816This is a small income, but these coins will be enough for you to explore some projects.Register on https://www.bitget.com/ without KYC or others and try to make some money first, just don't spend more than $100 at the beginning.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5414537.msg60989250#msg60989250

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMHi, I start learning cryptocurrency nowadays everywhere in the field of life like the technology boom has come and also in crypto filed but everyone asks in tiktok join group in some fees for signals. I want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? what is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.In simple words, the most secure investment is bitcoin, but this doesn't exclude it from being a risky investment too. Please Don't believe in investment advices because no one can garantee that you will earn from buying any of the cryptos you see in he actual market.Weekly income of 20-30$ isn't that much. You can earn 4-5$ daily if you do freelance jobs but it always depends on the skills you have. You can check this great topic [Pinned in top of this board] and see if one of the suggestions fit your needs :How to earn Bitcoins

comments.author: Cheema02
comments.body: Quote from: safar1980 on May 19, 2023, 12:35:18 PMParticipate in Bitcointalk Contests And Giveaways, here you can win some bitcoins.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5448924.0In a few months, you will be able to apply to the Bitcointalk Signature-Ad Campaigns if you earn merithttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=615953.msg62240816#msg62240816This is a small income, but these coins will be enough for you to explore some projects.Register on https://www.bitget.com/ without KYC or others and try to make some money first, just don't spend more than $100 at the beginning.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5414537.msg60989250#msg60989250Thanks, Safar1980 for sharing such amazing things I will your advice and participate in these platforms one by one. But 1 more question is how to earn from the signature Ad campaign and how to earn merit. What are the Requirements to earn merit or do some give memeritt?Also, I'm trying to register my account on Bitget.is there any fees of trading on bitget or free of cost.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:31:03 PMThanks so much for sharing these Links. I will follow these links and gain my knowledge. Can you suggest to me the best Video content on YouTube Channel So I easily understand and get some knowledge and share it also on bitcoin talk to help Others and also mine to start trading in cryptocurrencies? My second question is how to start earn from this platforms except than bounties because mostly doing scams.Search for Andreas Antonopoulos videos on YouTube https://youtube.com/@aantonop, he’s a good source of crypto knowledge. He’s the author of the book “Mastering Bitcoin” which was recommended by Cantsay earlier. I recommend watching his videos to anyone who wants to learn about the bitcoin ecosystem. For your second question, it’s true most bounties are useless and since you do not have any money to buy bitcoin you can grow your bitcointalk account to full member rank and hopefully participate in signature campaigns.

comments.author: ZAINmalik75
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMeveryone asks in tiktok join group in some fees for signals.It will be better for you to avoid such kind of stuff because it will limit you thinking and you will be relay on them, also they will take benefits of you and all of the other members by providing signals of all those coin where they invest alredy so through your fund they will pump the price and dump it again by selling all of Thier stuff QuoteI want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? Currently according to trend Bitcoin will be the best way of earning due to thier volatile movement, For a better understanding I will suggest "Bitcoin Mastering" book where you will get answers of each and every question about Cryptocurrency. Also earning for bitcointalk without any investment need higher rank through which you can participate in different signature and bounties, not only that you can earn from here by providing different services.

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMHi, I start learning cryptocurrency nowadays everywhere in the field of life like the technology boom has come and also in crypto filed but everyone asks in tiktok join group in some fees for signals.If you really want to make money from cryptocurrency and you want to stay long in crypto space then you should avoid trading signals, most of those videos you are seeing on TikTok are fake, they just want to steal from you, they will definitely end up sending fake signals to you and by then you will have paid them already and their is nothing you can do about it. If you really want to trade, then you have to depend on yourself and not anybody. Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PM I want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? what is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.Everything you need to know about trading or bitcoin investment, then you can definitely learn it here, just keep on asking questions and keep on making contributions to post, and also you can watch some videos on YouTube, but you don't really have to trust most of those videos on YouTube, they only talk about profit and hardly see them saying they lose in a trade.Their are different ways which you can make money on the forum here, you can participate in bounties, signature and you can also sell out your service to other members of the forum. But if you want to participate in signature you have to rank up first, if you are making positive contributions to the forum, then you will definitely be receiving merit, if you are after merits that's when you won't be getting it and you might endup going against the forum rules.

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: I dunno what you mean by everything you said but according to your topic sentence, I'll say this; don't ever feel it's best to invest in the digital market,.. it has its PROs and CONs too ... Nothing good comes easily anyways but I feel it's best to invest in a business around you, at your convenience... That's make more sense for a start and Will also be at your reach to pick a huge or smaller funds whenever you need them.It's best to buy and HODL Bitcoin when you've been settled in real life - that doesn't mean Bitcoin isn't paying - it has only got a slow process that might make things miserable for you, especially when you're in trouble and you need them funds back to solve them.Sandra 🧑‍🦰

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 06:41:01 PMBut 1 more question is how to earn from the signature Ad campaign and how to earn merit. What are the Requirements to earn merit or do some give memeritt?Also, I'm trying to register my account on Bitget.is there any fees of trading on bitget or free of cost.Forum rules: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.msg7955645#msg7955645Rank & activity: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=178608.msg1861412#msg1861412Merit and rank requirements: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2818350.msg28856522#msg28856522It’s good to ask questions but you should also do your research. The search engine is at your disposal, there are multiple threads about merit. Merits is kind of a reward for quality posts, you will have to make valuable contributions to forum discussion. To participate in signature campaigns, you need to first become a good poster, so you just have to focus on learning about bitcoin from the sources mentioned above, you will find it easy to increase your ranks when you have knowledge on subjects being discussed.

comments.author: SOKO-DEKE
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMHi, I start learning cryptocurrency nowadays everywhere in the field of life like the technology boom has come and also in crypto filed but everyone asks in tiktok join group in some fees for signals. I don't believe in any signals because the majority of groups that provide signals are simply also  predicting as we also doing, and the few groups signal that actually provide signals are merely using their subscribers as a means of profit because they never provide the optimal selling window.I think they are all scams, there is no guarantee of generating any money via groups signal. Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMI want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? Once you can provide good service here you may be able to start earning without having to invest any amount. However, before you can do any of this, you must learn things from the forum first, especially becoming familiar with the site's basic regulations which I can see that some member have provided you with the link that will guide you.In a nutshell, let me just say that you can be earning money in Bitcointalk here by joining Bounty which is by doing advertising about some new projects, so tasks will been given to you and once the the manager in charge is satisfied with you work you may be rewarded with usdt or tokens but no guarantee that all project you work for will pay you after completing the tasks you are given to, another one is signature which you can't join currently because of low rank, ranks that do get the opportunity to join the signature campaigns are ranks start from member rank upward.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Cheema02 on May 19, 2023, 12:04:47 PMHi, I start learning cryptocurrency nowadays everywhere in the field of life like the technology boom has come and also in crypto filed but everyone asks in tiktok join group for some fees for signals. I want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk. what is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.Don't fall for those trading signal providers because in the long run, you will end I lose because their predictions are not most time accurate,  this is reality and that is the setback for those who want to depend on third-party signal groups to make decisions. One thing I will like you to get settled with is that trading is gambling but trading your own gambling is as if you are gambling you vs another customer's casino own gambling you play against the house.

comments.author: Obari

I want to start learning and earning anyone guides on how to do it without any investment and how to start earning from Bitcointalk? what is the best way to learn from a YouTube channel or Group for free please mentioned the names helping to start earning.You should avoid most of those channels asking you to pay  some amount of money for trading signals and since you're already in the forum, i want to officially  welcome you on board and I want to also let you know that, you're at the right place and I will also advise you that you should be in a haste to make profits from the industry as it isn't a ponzi or get rich quick scheme.First things first,  which is that you have to invest in getting knowledgeable  about what you're about investing in and by so doing, stay updated at all times..And since you're already in the forum,  you should take advantage  to ask questions  wherever  you find things difficult about crypto.Welcome onboard.
